computer.description:
The ISOT 1037S was a 8/16-bit professional system.
It was a modular multiprocessor system, able to use either a 16-bit or a 8-bit processor mudule.
It could be also used as an inteligent terminal with good networking and graphic capabilities, in connection with ES and CM bulgarian mainframes, through SDLC ADLC and BSC network protocols.
Thanks to Bojidar Stefanov for information and picture.
computer.keyboard: Typewriter type with numeric keypad and function keys
computer.media: 1or 2 x 5.25'' 512 KB floppy drives, 1 or 2 x 5.25'' 10 or 20 MB hard disks
computer.name: EC-1037S
computer.rom: 64 KB holding BIOS and comunication software for terminal mode
